resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105944</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105944</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086757</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Power</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of downloadable video clips on the theme of Power, with guiding questions for students. Clips are drawn from the following PBS WIDE ANGLE documentaries: "A State of Mind" (2003), "Ladies First" (2004), "Border Jumpers" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung downloadable videoclips auf dem 
Thema der Energie, mit leitenden Fragen für Kursteilnehmer. 
Clips werden von den folgenden PBS Weitwinkeldokumentarfilmen 
gezeichnet: "ein Geisteszustand" (2003), "Damen zuerst" (2004), 
"Rand-Überbrücker" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de clips visuels downloadable sur 
le thème de la puissance, avec des questions de guidage pour des 
étudiants. Des clips sont tirés des documentaires 
GRANDS-ANGULAIRES suivants de PBS : "un état d'esprit" (2003), 
les "dames en premier" (2004), "cavaliers de cadre" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de grampos video downloadable no 
tema da potência, com perguntas guiando para estudantes. Os 
grampos são desenhados dos seguintes documentaries LARGOS do ÂNGULO 
de PBS: "um estado de mente" (2003), "senhoras primeiramente" 
(2004), da "ligações em ponte beira" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di video clip downloadable sul tema
di potenza, con le domande guidanti per gli allievi. Le clip 
sono estratte dai seguenti documentaries GRANDANGOLARI di PBS: 
"un Dichiarare della mente" (2003), "signore in primo luogo" 
(2004), "ponticelli del bordo" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τηλεκατεγραφόμενων τηλεοπτικών 
συνδετήρων στο θέμα της δύναμης, με την καθοδήγηση των ερωτήσεων 
για τους σπουδαστές. Οι συνδετήρες προέρχονται από τα 
ακόλουθα ντοκιμαντέρ PBS WIDE.ANGLE: "Ένα κράτος του 
μυαλού" (2003), "κυρίες πρώτα" (2004), "άλτες συνόρων" 
(2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de clips video downloadable en el 
tema de la potencia, con las preguntas de guía para los estudiantes. 
Los clips se trazan de los documentaries GRANANGULARES 
siguientes de PBS: "un estado de la mente" (2003), "señoras 
primero" (2004), "puentes de la frontera" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086757</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105944</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/power</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
